title: Azir ward quote bug
body: Whenever an allied Azir places a ward his ward quote can be heard by the whole team

replies.body:
Heya Bladerunner7777 - 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here. ^-^
Take your time fixing this bug, I think it's pretty cool :U
LOL. At least you don't hate it.
Tbh I like it a lot and I think everyone should get a global ward quote so your team knows who's not warding

There's plenty of good VO lines that are great, so I don't think most players mind.
If only Twitch's Step-in-a-Caitlyn-trap line was global.
I recently learned that this bug applies to other champions with ward quotes such as Cassiopeia and Karthus
Ahh, interesting. Do you know which quotes? Or is this the same case as above, where it's ward placement?
Ohhhhh. It's anyone with ward quotes. Merrr. Okay, thank you! :)
The glory of Shurima should be heard across the map {{champion:268}}
I hear it on Twitch when I party with my brother and he plays him. He said he's heard me when I was Sion and Karthus.
My "it may not be a bug" senses are tingling, but then again.... hmmmm....Well played.
